page.title: 09CROWLANDS JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Crowlands Junior School was built in the late part of the nineteenth century.It was first called St.Andrews (from the local church) and later London Road School.In 1985 there are 184 pupils on roll with 8 teachers,a headteacher,four perepetetic music teachers,an ancillary,3 mid_day assistants,a caretaker and 3 cleaning staff. A playground surrounds the school.There ia no grass area for games lessons.Because of this the children in the third and fourth year travel to Westlands Playing Fields to take their games lessons there.
